name: Engine
description: The engine is the main part of the car that produces power.

name: Transmission
description: The transmission is a system that transmits power from the engine to the wheels.

name: Brakes
description: Brakes are used to slow down or stop the car.

name: Steering Wheel
description: The steering wheel allows the driver to control the direction of the car.

name: Tires
description: Tires provide traction between the car and the road surface.
